attributes.action: prevent all persons bearing a Chinese passport from entering the shores of Gt Britain until Tibet is free again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time for the public of Greater Britain to live up to their supposed beliefs of fairness, truthfulness and Religious equality. We need to demand that our government take action regarding Tibet who the world ignored when they were invaded after WWII. this petition seek to pressurise the chinese government to rethink its policy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
